import React from "react"; import Fade from "react-reveal/Fade"; import InputFile from "elements/Form/InputFile"; import InputText from "elements/Form/InputText"; import logoBca from "assets/images/logo-bca.jpg"; import logoMandiri from "assets/images/logo-mandiri.jpg"; export default function Payment(props) { const { data, ItemDetails, checkout } = this.props; const tax = 10; const subTotal = ItemDetails.price * checkout.duration; const grandTotal = (subTotal * tax) / 100 + subTotal; return (

Transfer Pembayaran

Tax: {tax} %

Sub total: ${subTotal} USD

Total: ${grandTotal} USD

Bank Central Asia
2208 1998
Staycation BCA
Bank Mandiri
2208 1998
Staycation Mandiri
); }
